name: Bankster
description:
Risk it all, or play it safe? The choice is yours in Bankster.
Expect a world of back-room negotiations, criminal enterprise, and an in depth financial system.

There will be Tough Moral Choices, Secret Societies, Alien Technology, and even Interplanetary Councils, as you rise through the ranks to build your Wealth & Power.

Establish your first Bank. Expand your territory. Take over your opponents. Become a Federal Reserve. Even make your own currency. Then, use it against enemy nations. Soon you'll control the planet. Its all just a starting platform for your negotiations towards the colonization of other worlds. Only you can plot your path in this financial conflict. Your wealth will buy you VICTORY!

Banksters awaits.

Key Features:

+ Fully Procedural Terrain.
+ Immersive Soundtrack
+ Vehicles (Yacht, Sports Car, Helicopter)
+ Contracts. (Invest in businesses within your empire, then trade or sell their contracts as you progress.)
